title.text: An Automatic Method for Building a Data-to-Text Generator

introductionContent.text: We describe our contribution to the Generating from Knowledge Bases (KBgen) challenge.
Our system is learned in a bottom-up fashion, by inducing a probabilistic grammar that represents alignments between strings and parts of a knowledge graph.
From these alignments, we extract information about the linearization and lexical choices associated with the target knowledge base, and build a simple generate-and-rank system in the style of.
